rooms.description: A spacious entrance hall designed for a grand reception with integrated smart home features.
Open and minimalist living space with a focus on natural light. Vastu-compliant east-west orientation for prosperity.
Adjacent to the kitchen for family meals. Open design enhances connectivity with the living area.
Spacious master bedroom in a quiet zone ensuring privacy and relaxation.
A comfortable guest room with Vastu guidelines, ideally located on the north-east side for auspicious energy.
Designated area for work and study, placed in a well-lit corner to stimulate creativity.

openings.description: Stately entrance door aligning with Vastu principles to welcome positive energy.
Large windows to maximize natural light and enhance the minimalist design.

garage.description: Two-car garage integrated with the ground floor ensuring seamless access.

rooms.description: A luxurious bedroom with ample natural light and a serene view.
Secondary bedroom that maintains privacy and comfort in line with minimalist design principles.

openings.description: Balcony opening providing access to a private terrace space.
Windows that allow abundant natural light and ventilation.

rooms.description: Expansive terrace designed for relaxation and entertainment, featuring a landscaped garden with integrated water features.

openings.description: Opening leading to the rooftop terrace offering panoramic views and outdoor living space.
